description: Heist scenario taxonomy with player ranges and role compatibility

scenarios.name: Museum Gala Vault Heist
scenarios.objective: Steal the jewels from the museum vault during a black-tie event.
scenarios.summary: Infiltrate a gala, secure access, crack the vault, and escape unnoticed.

scenarios.name: Mansion Panic Room
scenarios.objective: Steal a cash ledger hidden in a panic room.
scenarios.summary: Gain entry to a private mansion, bypass security, and crack a secure room.

scenarios.name: Casino Vault Night
scenarios.objective: Break into the casino vault and steal high-value chips.
scenarios.summary: Blend in on the floor, disable surveillance, and crack the vault.

scenarios.name: Armored Train Robbery
scenarios.objective: Steal a guarded artifact from a moving armored car.
scenarios.summary: Board the train, bypass guards, and extract the artifact.

scenarios.name: Secure Lab Prototype
scenarios.objective: Extract a prototype from a secure lab.
scenarios.summary: Infiltrate the lab, bypass access controls, and retrieve the item.

scenarios.name: Secure Office Bug Plant
scenarios.objective: Plant a surveillance bug in a secure executive office.
scenarios.summary: Social-engineer access and place a device without detection.

scenarios.name: Gallery Art Swap
scenarios.objective: Replace a famous painting with a convincing forgery.
scenarios.summary: Distract staff, swap the artwork, and exit cleanly.

scenarios.name: Bank Safe Deposit Box
scenarios.objective: Access a specific safe deposit box and extract its contents.
scenarios.summary: Get past the lobby, reach the vault corridor, and open a target box.

scenarios.name: Police Evidence Room
scenarios.objective: Remove an evidence item and erase traces of the break-in.
scenarios.summary: Enter the station, retrieve the item, and clean evidence.

scenarios.name: Custody Extraction
scenarios.objective: Extract a prisoner from custody without triggering alarms.
scenarios.summary: Coordinate a diversion, access holding, and escape safely.

scenarios.name: Dockside Container Heist
scenarios.objective: Retrieve a crate from a guarded shipping container yard.
scenarios.summary: Navigate the yard, locate the container, and extract the cargo.
